channel.title: Comments on: There’s power outside of the browser: BrowserPlus from Yahoo!

item.title: By: Armen Shirvanian
item.dc:creator: Armen Shirvanian
item.description: The concept behind this creation seems to have some merit, but one would think that most would be fine staying within the confines of a browser. The added drag-and-drop capability could provide some new applications, such as dropping an mp3 files straight to one's desktop. An open-source version, as brought up in the article, may add the features of this program as an extension to Firefox
item.content:encoded: The concept behind this creation seems to have some merit, but one would think that most would be fine staying within the confines of a browser. The added drag-and-drop capability could provide some new applications, such as dropping an mp3 files straight to one’s desktop. An open-source version, as brought up in the article, may add the features of this program as an extension to Firefox
